00018    : Nodes(Do)
00019 {

00021    RangeType = SCALAR;
00022 }

00087 void NodalFiniteElement::NodalLocalInterpolation (
00088    ElementTransformation &Trans, DenseMatrix &I,
00089    const NodalFiniteElement &fine_fe) const
00090 {
00091    double v[3];
00092    Vector vv (v, Dim);
00093    IntegrationPoint f_ip;
00094 
00095    for (int i = 0; i < fine_fe.Dof; i++)
00096    {
00097       Trans.Transform (fine_fe.Nodes.IntPoint (i), vv);
00098       f_ip.x = v[0];
00099       if (Dim > 1) { f_ip.y = v[1]; if (Dim > 2) f_ip.z = v[2]; }
00100       CalcShape (f_ip, c_shape);
00101       for (int j = 0; j < Dof; j++)
00102          if (fabs (I (i,j) = c_shape (j)) < 1.0e-12)
00103             I (i,j) = 0.0;
00104    }
00105 }
00106 
00107 void NodalFiniteElement::Project (
00108    Coefficient &coeff, ElementTransformation &Trans, Vector &dofs) const
00109 {
00110    for (int i = 0; i < Dof; i++)
00111    {
00112       const IntegrationPoint &ip = Nodes.IntPoint(i);
00113       // some coefficients expect that Trans.IntPoint is the same
00114       // as the second argument of Eval
00115       Trans.SetIntPoint(&ip);
00116       dofs(i) = coeff.Eval (Trans, ip);
00117    }
00118 }
00119 
00120 void NodalFiniteElement::Project (
00121    VectorCoefficient &vc, ElementTransformation &Trans,
00122    Vector &dofs) const
00123 {
00124    double v[3];
00125    Vector x (v, vc.GetVDim());
00126 
00127    for (int i = 0; i < Dof; i++)
00128    {
00129       const IntegrationPoint &ip = Nodes.IntPoint(i);
00130       Trans.SetIntPoint(&ip);
00131       vc.Eval (x, Trans, ip);
00132       for (int j = 0; j < x.Size(); j++)
00133          dofs(Dof*j+i) = v[j];
00134    }
00135 }

00151 
00152 void VectorFiniteElement::CalcVShape_RT (
00153    ElementTransformation &Trans, DenseMatrix &shape) const
00154 {
00155    CalcVShape (Trans.GetIntPoint(), vshape);
00156 
00157    MultABt (vshape, Trans.Jacobian(), shape);
00158 
00159    shape *= (1.0 / Trans.Weight());
00160 }
00161 
00162 void VectorFiniteElement::CalcVShape_ND (
00163    ElementTransformation &Trans, DenseMatrix &shape) const
00164 {
00165    CalcInverse (Trans.Jacobian(), Jinv);
00166 
00167    CalcVShape (Trans.GetIntPoint(), vshape);
00168 
00169    Mult (vshape, Jinv, shape);
00170 }

00238 BiLinear2DFiniteElement::BiLinear2DFiniteElement()
00239    : NodalFiniteElement(2, Geometry::SQUARE , 4, 1, FunctionSpace::Qk)
00240 {
00241    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = 0.0;
00242    Nodes.IntPoint(0).y = 0.0;
00243    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = 1.0;
00244    Nodes.IntPoint(1).y = 0.0;
00245    Nodes.IntPoint(2).x = 1.0;
00246    Nodes.IntPoint(2).y = 1.0;
00247    Nodes.IntPoint(3).x = 0.0;
00248    Nodes.IntPoint(3).y = 1.0;
00249 }
00250 
00251 void BiLinear2DFiniteElement::CalcShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00252                                         Vector &shape) const
00253 {
00254    shape(0) = (1. - ip.x) * (1. - ip.y) ;
00255    shape(1) = ip.x * (1. - ip.y) ;
00256    shape(2) = ip.x * ip.y ;
00257    shape(3) = (1. - ip.x) * ip.y ;
00258 }
00259 
00260 void BiLinear2DFiniteElement::CalcDShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00261                                          DenseMatrix &dshape) const
00262 {
00263    dshape(0,0) = -1. + ip.y; dshape(0,1) = -1. + ip.x ;
00264    dshape(1,0) =  1. - ip.y; dshape(1,1) = -ip.x ;
00265    dshape(2,0) =  ip.y ;     dshape(2,1) = ip.x ;
00266    dshape(3,0) = -ip.y ;     dshape(3,1) = 1. - ip.x ;
00267 }
00268 
00269 void BiLinear2DFiniteElement::CalcHessian(
00270    const IntegrationPoint &ip, DenseMatrix &h) const
00271 {
00272    h( 0,0) = 0.;   h( 0,1) =  1.;   h( 0,2) = 0.;
00273    h( 1,0) = 0.;   h( 1,1) = -1.;   h( 1,2) = 0.;
00274    h( 2,0) = 0.;   h( 2,1) =  1.;   h( 2,2) = 0.;
00275    h( 3,0) = 0.;   h( 3,1) = -1.;   h( 3,2) = 0.;
00276 }

00279 GaussLinear2DFiniteElement::GaussLinear2DFiniteElement()
00280    : NodalFiniteElement(2, Geometry::TRIANGLE, 3, 1, FunctionSpace::Pk)
00281 {
00282    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = 1./6.;
00283    Nodes.IntPoint(0).y = 1./6.;
00284    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = 2./3.;
00285    Nodes.IntPoint(1).y = 1./6.;
00286    Nodes.IntPoint(2).x = 1./6.;
00287    Nodes.IntPoint(2).y = 2./3.;
00288 }
00289 
00290 void GaussLinear2DFiniteElement::CalcShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00291                                            Vector &shape) const
00292 {
00293    const double x = ip.x, y = ip.y;
00294 
00295    shape(0) = 5./3. - 2. * (x + y);
00296    shape(1) = 2. * (x - 1./6.);
00297    shape(2) = 2. * (y - 1./6.);
00298 }
00299 
00300 void GaussLinear2DFiniteElement::CalcDShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00301                                             DenseMatrix &dshape) const
00302 {
00303    dshape(0,0) = -2.;  dshape(0,1) = -2.;
00304    dshape(1,0) =  2.;  dshape(1,1) =  0.;
00305    dshape(2,0) =  0.;  dshape(2,1) =  2.;
00306 }
00307 
00308 void GaussLinear2DFiniteElement::ProjectDelta(int vertex, Vector &dofs) const
00309 {
00310    dofs(vertex)       = 2./3.;
00311    dofs((vertex+1)%3) = 1./6.;
00312    dofs((vertex+2)%3) = 1./6.;
00313 }

00316 // 0.5-0.5/sqrt(3) and 0.5+0.5/sqrt(3)
00317 const double GaussBiLinear2DFiniteElement::p[] =
00318 { 0.2113248654051871177454256, 0.7886751345948128822545744 };
00319 
00320 GaussBiLinear2DFiniteElement::GaussBiLinear2DFiniteElement()
00321    : NodalFiniteElement(2, Geometry::SQUARE, 4, 1, FunctionSpace::Qk)
00322 {
00323    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = p[0];
00324    Nodes.IntPoint(0).y = p[0];
00325    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = p[1];
00326    Nodes.IntPoint(1).y = p[0];
00327    Nodes.IntPoint(2).x = p[1];
00328    Nodes.IntPoint(2).y = p[1];
00329    Nodes.IntPoint(3).x = p[0];
00330    Nodes.IntPoint(3).y = p[1];
00331 }
00332 
00333 void GaussBiLinear2DFiniteElement::CalcShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00334                                              Vector &shape) const
00335 {
00336    const double x = ip.x, y = ip.y;
00337 
00338    shape(0) = 3. * (p[1] - x) * (p[1] - y);
00339    shape(1) = 3. * (x - p[0]) * (p[1] - y);
00340    shape(2) = 3. * (x - p[0]) * (y - p[0]);
00341    shape(3) = 3. * (p[1] - x) * (y - p[0]);
00342 }
00343 
00344 void GaussBiLinear2DFiniteElement::CalcDShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00345                                               DenseMatrix &dshape) const
00346 {
00347    const double x = ip.x, y = ip.y;
00348 
00349    dshape(0,0) = 3. * (y - p[1]);  dshape(0,1) = 3. * (x - p[1]);
00350    dshape(1,0) = 3. * (p[1] - y);  dshape(1,1) = 3. * (p[0] - x);
00351    dshape(2,0) = 3. * (y - p[0]);  dshape(2,1) = 3. * (x - p[0]);
00352    dshape(3,0) = 3. * (p[0] - y);  dshape(3,1) = 3. * (p[1] - x);
00353 }
00354 
00355 void GaussBiLinear2DFiniteElement::ProjectDelta(int vertex, Vector &dofs) const
00356 {
00357 #if 1
00358    dofs(vertex)       = p[1]*p[1];
00359    dofs((vertex+1)%4) = p[0]*p[1];
00360    dofs((vertex+2)%4) = p[0]*p[0];
00361    dofs((vertex+3)%4) = p[0]*p[1];
00362 #else
00363    dofs = 1.0;
00364 #endif
00365 }

00396 Quad1DFiniteElement::Quad1DFiniteElement()
00397    : NodalFiniteElement(1, Geometry::SEGMENT, 3, 2)
00398 {
00399    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = 0.0;
00400    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = 1.0;
00401    Nodes.IntPoint(2).x = 0.5;
00402 }
00403 
00404 void Quad1DFiniteElement::CalcShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00405                                     Vector &shape) const
00406 {
00407    double x = ip.x;
00408    double l1 = 1.0 - x, l2 = x, l3 = 2. * x - 1.;
00409 
00410    shape(0) = l1 * (-l3);
00411    shape(1) = l2 * l3;
00412    shape(2) = 4. * l1 * l2;
00413 }
00414 
00415 void Quad1DFiniteElement::CalcDShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00416                                      DenseMatrix &dshape) const
00417 {
00418    double x = ip.x;
00419 
00420    dshape(0,0) = 4. * x - 3.;
00421    dshape(1,0) = 4. * x - 1.;
00422    dshape(2,0) = 4. - 8. * x;
00423 }
00424

00426 QuadPos1DFiniteElement::QuadPos1DFiniteElement()
00427    : FiniteElement(1, Geometry::SEGMENT, 3, 2)
00428 {
00429    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = 0.0;
00430    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = 1.0;
00431    Nodes.IntPoint(2).x = 0.5;
00432 }
00433 
00434 void QuadPos1DFiniteElement::CalcShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00435                                        Vector &shape) const
00436 {
00437    const double x = ip.x, x1 = 1. - x;
00438 
00439    shape(0) = x1 * x1;
00440    shape(1) = x * x;
00441    shape(2) = 2. * x * x1;
00442 }
00443 
00444 void QuadPos1DFiniteElement::CalcDShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00445                                         DenseMatrix &dshape) const
00446 {
00447    const double x = ip.x;
00448 
00449    dshape(0,0) = 2. * x - 2.;
00450    dshape(1,0) = 2. * x;
00451    dshape(2,0) = 2. - 4. * x;
00452 }
00453 
00454 Quad2DFiniteElement::Quad2DFiniteElement()
00455    : NodalFiniteElement(2, Geometry::TRIANGLE, 6, 2)
00456 {
00457    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = 0.0;
00458    Nodes.IntPoint(0).y = 0.0;
00459    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = 1.0;
00460    Nodes.IntPoint(1).y = 0.0;
00461    Nodes.IntPoint(2).x = 0.0;
00462    Nodes.IntPoint(2).y = 1.0;
00463    Nodes.IntPoint(3).x = 0.5;
00464    Nodes.IntPoint(3).y = 0.0;
00465    Nodes.IntPoint(4).x = 0.5;
00466    Nodes.IntPoint(4).y = 0.5;
00467    Nodes.IntPoint(5).x = 0.0;
00468    Nodes.IntPoint(5).y = 0.5;
00469 }
00470 
00471 void Quad2DFiniteElement::CalcShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00472                                     Vector &shape) const
00473 {
00474    double x = ip.x, y = ip.y;
00475    double l1 = 1.-x-y, l2 = x, l3 = y;
00476 
00477    shape(0) = l1 * (2. * l1 - 1.);
00478    shape(1) = l2 * (2. * l2 - 1.);
00479    shape(2) = l3 * (2. * l3 - 1.);
00480    shape(3) = 4. * l1 * l2;
00481    shape(4) = 4. * l2 * l3;
00482    shape(5) = 4. * l3 * l1;
00483 }
00484 
00485 void Quad2DFiniteElement::CalcDShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00486                                      DenseMatrix &dshape) const
00487 {
00488    double x = ip.x, y = ip.y;
00489 
00490    dshape(0,0) =
00491       dshape(0,1) = 4. * (x + y) - 3.;
00492 
00493    dshape(1,0) = 4. * x - 1.;
00494    dshape(1,1) = 0.;
00495 
00496    dshape(2,0) = 0.;
00497    dshape(2,1) = 4. * y - 1.;
00498 
00499    dshape(3,0) = -4. * (2. * x + y - 1.);
00500    dshape(3,1) = -4. * x;
00501 
00502    dshape(4,0) = 4. * y;
00503    dshape(4,1) = 4. * x;
00504 
00505    dshape(5,0) = -4. * y;
00506    dshape(5,1) = -4. * (x + 2. * y - 1.);
00507 }
00508 
00509 void Quad2DFiniteElement::CalcHessian (const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00510                                        DenseMatrix &h) const
00511 {
00512    h(0,0) = 4.;
00513    h(0,1) = 4.;
00514    h(0,2) = 4.;
00515 
00516    h(1,0) = 4.;
00517    h(1,1) = 0.;
00518    h(1,2) = 0.;
00519 
00520    h(2,0) = 0.;
00521    h(2,1) = 0.;
00522    h(2,2) = 4.;
00523 
00524    h(3,0) = -8.;
00525    h(3,1) = -4.;
00526    h(3,2) =  0.;
00527 
00528    h(4,0) = 0.;
00529    h(4,1) = 4.;
00530    h(4,2) = 0.;
00531 
00532    h(5,0) =  0.;
00533    h(5,1) = -4.;
00534    h(5,2) = -8.;
00535 }
00536 
00537 void Quad2DFiniteElement::ProjectDelta(int vertex, Vector &dofs) const
00538 {
00539 #if 0
00540    dofs = 1.;
00541 #else
00542    dofs = 0.;
00543    dofs(vertex) = 1.;
00544    switch (vertex)
00545    {
00546    case 0: dofs(3) = 0.25; dofs(5) = 0.25; break;
00547    case 1: dofs(3) = 0.25; dofs(4) = 0.25; break;
00548    case 2: dofs(4) = 0.25; dofs(5) = 0.25; break;
00549    }
00550 #endif
00551 }

00553 
00554 const double GaussQuad2DFiniteElement::p[] =
00555 { 0.0915762135097707434595714634022015, 0.445948490915964886318329253883051 };
00556 
00557 GaussQuad2DFiniteElement::GaussQuad2DFiniteElement()
00558    : NodalFiniteElement(2, Geometry::TRIANGLE, 6, 2), A(6), D(6,2), pol(6)
00559 {
00560    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = p[0];
00561    Nodes.IntPoint(0).y = p[0];
00562    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = 1. - 2. * p[0];
00563    Nodes.IntPoint(1).y = p[0];
00564    Nodes.IntPoint(2).x = p[0];
00565    Nodes.IntPoint(2).y = 1. - 2. * p[0];
00566    Nodes.IntPoint(3).x = p[1];
00567    Nodes.IntPoint(3).y = p[1];
00568    Nodes.IntPoint(4).x = 1. - 2. * p[1];
00569    Nodes.IntPoint(4).y = p[1];
00570    Nodes.IntPoint(5).x = p[1];
00571    Nodes.IntPoint(5).y = 1. - 2. * p[1];
00572 
00573    for (int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
00574    {
00575       const double x = Nodes.IntPoint(i).x, y = Nodes.IntPoint(i).y;
00576       A(0,i) = 1.;
00577       A(1,i) = x;
00578       A(2,i) = y;
00579       A(3,i) = x * x;
00580       A(4,i) = x * y;
00581       A(5,i) = y * y;
00582    }
00583 
00584    A.Invert();
00585 }
00586 
00587 void GaussQuad2DFiniteElement::CalcShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00588                                          Vector &shape) const
00589 {
00590    const double x = ip.x, y = ip.y;
00591    pol(0) = 1.;
00592    pol(1) = x;
00593    pol(2) = y;
00594    pol(3) = x * x;
00595    pol(4) = x * y;
00596    pol(5) = y * y;
00597 
00598    A.Mult(pol, shape);
00599 }
00600 
00601 void GaussQuad2DFiniteElement::CalcDShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00602                                           DenseMatrix &dshape) const
00603 {
00604    const double x = ip.x, y = ip.y;
00605    D(0,0) = 0.;      D(0,1) = 0.;
00606    D(1,0) = 1.;      D(1,1) = 0.;
00607    D(2,0) = 0.;      D(2,1) = 1.;
00608    D(3,0) = 2. *  x; D(3,1) = 0.;
00609    D(4,0) = y;       D(4,1) = x;
00610    D(5,0) = 0.;      D(5,1) = 2. * y;
00611 
00612    Mult(A, D, dshape);
00613 }
00614 
00615 
00616 BiQuad2DFiniteElement::BiQuad2DFiniteElement()
00617    : NodalFiniteElement(2, Geometry::SQUARE, 9, 2, FunctionSpace::Qk)
00618 {
00619    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = 0.0;
00620    Nodes.IntPoint(0).y = 0.0;
00621    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = 1.0;
00622    Nodes.IntPoint(1).y = 0.0;
00623    Nodes.IntPoint(2).x = 1.0;
00624    Nodes.IntPoint(2).y = 1.0;
00625    Nodes.IntPoint(3).x = 0.0;
00626    Nodes.IntPoint(3).y = 1.0;
00627    Nodes.IntPoint(4).x = 0.5;
00628    Nodes.IntPoint(4).y = 0.0;
00629    Nodes.IntPoint(5).x = 1.0;
00630    Nodes.IntPoint(5).y = 0.5;
00631    Nodes.IntPoint(6).x = 0.5;
00632    Nodes.IntPoint(6).y = 1.0;
00633    Nodes.IntPoint(7).x = 0.0;
00634    Nodes.IntPoint(7).y = 0.5;
00635    Nodes.IntPoint(8).x = 0.5;
00636    Nodes.IntPoint(8).y = 0.5;
00637 }
00638 
00639 void BiQuad2DFiniteElement::CalcShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00640                                       Vector &shape) const
00641 {
00642    double x = ip.x, y = ip.y;
00643    double l1x, l2x, l3x, l1y, l2y, l3y;
00644 
00645    l1x = (x - 1.) * (2. * x - 1);
00646    l2x = 4. * x * (1. - x);
00647    l3x = x * (2. * x - 1.);
00648    l1y = (y - 1.) * (2. * y - 1);
00649    l2y = 4. * y * (1. - y);
00650    l3y = y * (2. * y - 1.);
00651 
00652    shape(0) = l1x * l1y;
00653    shape(4) = l2x * l1y;
00654    shape(1) = l3x * l1y;
00655    shape(7) = l1x * l2y;
00656    shape(8) = l2x * l2y;
00657    shape(5) = l3x * l2y;
00658    shape(3) = l1x * l3y;
00659    shape(6) = l2x * l3y;
00660    shape(2) = l3x * l3y;
00661 }
00662 
00663 void BiQuad2DFiniteElement::CalcDShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00664                                        DenseMatrix &dshape) const
00665 {
00666    double x = ip.x, y = ip.y;
00667    double l1x, l2x, l3x, l1y, l2y, l3y;
00668    double d1x, d2x, d3x, d1y, d2y, d3y;
00669 
00670    l1x = (x - 1.) * (2. * x - 1);
00671    l2x = 4. * x * (1. - x);
00672    l3x = x * (2. * x - 1.);
00673    l1y = (y - 1.) * (2. * y - 1);
00674    l2y = 4. * y * (1. - y);
00675    l3y = y * (2. * y - 1.);
00676 
00677    d1x = 4. * x - 3.;
00678    d2x = 4. - 8. * x;
00679    d3x = 4. * x - 1.;
00680    d1y = 4. * y - 3.;
00681    d2y = 4. - 8. * y;
00682    d3y = 4. * y - 1.;
00683 
00684    dshape(0,0) = d1x * l1y;
00685    dshape(0,1) = l1x * d1y;
00686 
00687    dshape(4,0) = d2x * l1y;
00688    dshape(4,1) = l2x * d1y;
00689 
00690    dshape(1,0) = d3x * l1y;
00691    dshape(1,1) = l3x * d1y;
00692 
00693    dshape(7,0) = d1x * l2y;
00694    dshape(7,1) = l1x * d2y;
00695 
00696    dshape(8,0) = d2x * l2y;
00697    dshape(8,1) = l2x * d2y;
00698 
00699    dshape(5,0) = d3x * l2y;
00700    dshape(5,1) = l3x * d2y;
00701 
00702    dshape(3,0) = d1x * l3y;
00703    dshape(3,1) = l1x * d3y;
00704 
00705    dshape(6,0) = d2x * l3y;
00706    dshape(6,1) = l2x * d3y;
00707 
00708    dshape(2,0) = d3x * l3y;
00709    dshape(2,1) = l3x * d3y;
00710 }
00711 
00712 void BiQuad2DFiniteElement::ProjectDelta(int vertex, Vector &dofs) const
00713 {
00714 #if 0
00715    dofs = 1.;
00716 #else
00717    dofs = 0.;
00718    dofs(vertex) = 1.;
00719    switch (vertex)
00720    {
00721    case 0: dofs(4) = 0.25; dofs(7) = 0.25; break;
00722    case 1: dofs(4) = 0.25; dofs(5) = 0.25; break;
00723    case 2: dofs(5) = 0.25; dofs(6) = 0.25; break;
00724    case 3: dofs(6) = 0.25; dofs(7) = 0.25; break;
00725    }
00726    dofs(8) = 1./16.;
00727 #endif
00728 }
00729 
00730 BiQuadPos2DFiniteElement::BiQuadPos2DFiniteElement()
00731    : FiniteElement(2, Geometry::SQUARE, 9, 2, FunctionSpace::Qk)
00732 {
00733    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = 0.0;
00734    Nodes.IntPoint(0).y = 0.0;
00735    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = 1.0;
00736    Nodes.IntPoint(1).y = 0.0;
00737    Nodes.IntPoint(2).x = 1.0;
00738    Nodes.IntPoint(2).y = 1.0;
00739    Nodes.IntPoint(3).x = 0.0;
00740    Nodes.IntPoint(3).y = 1.0;
00741    Nodes.IntPoint(4).x = 0.5;
00742    Nodes.IntPoint(4).y = 0.0;
00743    Nodes.IntPoint(5).x = 1.0;
00744    Nodes.IntPoint(5).y = 0.5;
00745    Nodes.IntPoint(6).x = 0.5;
00746    Nodes.IntPoint(6).y = 1.0;
00747    Nodes.IntPoint(7).x = 0.0;
00748    Nodes.IntPoint(7).y = 0.5;
00749    Nodes.IntPoint(8).x = 0.5;
00750    Nodes.IntPoint(8).y = 0.5;
00751 }
00752 
00753 void BiQuadPos2DFiniteElement::CalcShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00754                                          Vector &shape) const
00755 {
00756    double x = ip.x, y = ip.y;
00757    double l1x, l2x, l3x, l1y, l2y, l3y;
00758 
00759    l1x = (1. - x) * (1. - x);
00760    l2x = 2. * x * (1. - x);
00761    l3x = x * x;
00762    l1y = (1. - y) * (1. - y);
00763    l2y = 2. * y * (1. - y);
00764    l3y = y * y;
00765 
00766    shape(0) = l1x * l1y;
00767    shape(4) = l2x * l1y;
00768    shape(1) = l3x * l1y;
00769    shape(7) = l1x * l2y;
00770    shape(8) = l2x * l2y;
00771    shape(5) = l3x * l2y;
00772    shape(3) = l1x * l3y;
00773    shape(6) = l2x * l3y;
00774    shape(2) = l3x * l3y;
00775 }
00776 
00777 void BiQuadPos2DFiniteElement::CalcDShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00778                                           DenseMatrix &dshape) const
00779 {
00780    double x = ip.x, y = ip.y;
00781    double l1x, l2x, l3x, l1y, l2y, l3y;
00782    double d1x, d2x, d3x, d1y, d2y, d3y;
00783 
00784    l1x = (1. - x) * (1. - x);
00785    l2x = 2. * x * (1. - x);
00786    l3x = x * x;
00787    l1y = (1. - y) * (1. - y);
00788    l2y = 2. * y * (1. - y);
00789    l3y = y * y;
00790 
00791    d1x = 2. * x - 2.;
00792    d2x = 2. - 4. * x;
00793    d3x = 2. * x;
00794    d1y = 2. * y - 2.;
00795    d2y = 2. - 4. * y;
00796    d3y = 2. * y;
00797 
00798    dshape(0,0) = d1x * l1y;
00799    dshape(0,1) = l1x * d1y;
00800 
00801    dshape(4,0) = d2x * l1y;
00802    dshape(4,1) = l2x * d1y;
00803 
00804    dshape(1,0) = d3x * l1y;
00805    dshape(1,1) = l3x * d1y;
00806 
00807    dshape(7,0) = d1x * l2y;
00808    dshape(7,1) = l1x * d2y;
00809 
00810    dshape(8,0) = d2x * l2y;
00811    dshape(8,1) = l2x * d2y;
00812 
00813    dshape(5,0) = d3x * l2y;
00814    dshape(5,1) = l3x * d2y;
00815 
00816    dshape(3,0) = d1x * l3y;
00817    dshape(3,1) = l1x * d3y;
00818 
00819    dshape(6,0) = d2x * l3y;
00820    dshape(6,1) = l2x * d3y;
00821 
00822    dshape(2,0) = d3x * l3y;
00823    dshape(2,1) = l3x * d3y;
00824 }
00825 
00826 void BiQuadPos2DFiniteElement::Project(
00827    Coefficient &coeff, ElementTransformation &Trans, Vector &dofs) const
00828 {
00829    double *d = dofs;
00830 
00831    for (int i = 0; i < 9; i++)
00832    {
00833       const IntegrationPoint &ip = Nodes.IntPoint(i);
00834       Trans.SetIntPoint(&ip);
00835       d[i] = coeff.Eval(Trans, ip);
00836    }
00837    d[4] = 2. * d[4] - 0.5 * (d[0] + d[1]);
00838    d[5] = 2. * d[5] - 0.5 * (d[1] + d[2]);
00839    d[6] = 2. * d[6] - 0.5 * (d[2] + d[3]);
00840    d[7] = 2. * d[7] - 0.5 * (d[3] + d[0]);
00841    d[8] = 4. * d[8] - 0.5 * (d[4] + d[5] + d[6] + d[7]) -
00842       0.25 * (d[0] + d[1] + d[2] + d[3]);
00843 }
00844 
00845 void BiQuadPos2DFiniteElement::Project (
00846    VectorCoefficient &vc, ElementTransformation &Trans,
00847    Vector &dofs) const
00848 {
00849    double v[3];
00850    Vector x (v, vc.GetVDim());
00851 
00852    for (int i = 0; i < 9; i++)
00853    {
00854       const IntegrationPoint &ip = Nodes.IntPoint(i);
00855       Trans.SetIntPoint(&ip);
00856       vc.Eval (x, Trans, ip);
00857       for (int j = 0; j < x.Size(); j++)
00858          dofs(9*j+i) = v[j];
00859    }
00860    for (int j = 0; j < x.Size(); j++)
00861    {
00862       double *d = &dofs(9*j);
00863 
00864       d[4] = 2. * d[4] - 0.5 * (d[0] + d[1]);
00865       d[5] = 2. * d[5] - 0.5 * (d[1] + d[2]);
00866       d[6] = 2. * d[6] - 0.5 * (d[2] + d[3]);
00867       d[7] = 2. * d[7] - 0.5 * (d[3] + d[0]);
00868       d[8] = 4. * d[8] - 0.5 * (d[4] + d[5] + d[6] + d[7]) -
00869          0.25 * (d[0] + d[1] + d[2] + d[3]);
00870    }
00871 }
00872 
00873 
00874 GaussBiQuad2DFiniteElement::GaussBiQuad2DFiniteElement()
00875    : NodalFiniteElement(2, Geometry::SQUARE, 9, 2, FunctionSpace::Qk)
00876 {
00877    const double p1 = 0.5*(1.-sqrt(3./5.));
00878 
00879    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = p1;
00880    Nodes.IntPoint(0).y = p1;
00881    Nodes.IntPoint(4).x = 0.5;
00882    Nodes.IntPoint(4).y = p1;
00883    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = 1.-p1;
00884    Nodes.IntPoint(1).y = p1;
00885    Nodes.IntPoint(7).x = p1;
00886    Nodes.IntPoint(7).y = 0.5;
00887    Nodes.IntPoint(8).x = 0.5;
00888    Nodes.IntPoint(8).y = 0.5;
00889    Nodes.IntPoint(5).x = 1.-p1;
00890    Nodes.IntPoint(5).y = 0.5;
00891    Nodes.IntPoint(3).x = p1;
00892    Nodes.IntPoint(3).y = 1.-p1;
00893    Nodes.IntPoint(6).x = 0.5;
00894    Nodes.IntPoint(6).y = 1.-p1;
00895    Nodes.IntPoint(2).x = 1.-p1;
00896    Nodes.IntPoint(2).y = 1.-p1;
00897 }
00898 
00899 void GaussBiQuad2DFiniteElement::CalcShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00900                                            Vector &shape) const
00901 {
00902    const double a = sqrt(5./3.);
00903    const double p1 = 0.5*(1.-sqrt(3./5.));
00904 
00905    double x = a*(ip.x-p1), y = a*(ip.y-p1);
00906    double l1x, l2x, l3x, l1y, l2y, l3y;
00907 
00908    l1x = (x - 1.) * (2. * x - 1);
00909    l2x = 4. * x * (1. - x);
00910    l3x = x * (2. * x - 1.);
00911    l1y = (y - 1.) * (2. * y - 1);
00912    l2y = 4. * y * (1. - y);
00913    l3y = y * (2. * y - 1.);
00914 
00915    shape(0) = l1x * l1y;
00916    shape(4) = l2x * l1y;
00917    shape(1) = l3x * l1y;
00918    shape(7) = l1x * l2y;
00919    shape(8) = l2x * l2y;
00920    shape(5) = l3x * l2y;
00921    shape(3) = l1x * l3y;
00922    shape(6) = l2x * l3y;
00923    shape(2) = l3x * l3y;
00924 }
00925 
00926 void GaussBiQuad2DFiniteElement::CalcDShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
00927                                             DenseMatrix &dshape) const
00928 {
00929    const double a = sqrt(5./3.);
00930    const double p1 = 0.5*(1.-sqrt(3./5.));
00931 
00932    double x = a*(ip.x-p1), y = a*(ip.y-p1);
00933    double l1x, l2x, l3x, l1y, l2y, l3y;
00934    double d1x, d2x, d3x, d1y, d2y, d3y;
00935 
00936    l1x = (x - 1.) * (2. * x - 1);
00937    l2x = 4. * x * (1. - x);
00938    l3x = x * (2. * x - 1.);
00939    l1y = (y - 1.) * (2. * y - 1);
00940    l2y = 4. * y * (1. - y);
00941    l3y = y * (2. * y - 1.);
00942 
00943    d1x = a * (4. * x - 3.);
00944    d2x = a * (4. - 8. * x);
00945    d3x = a * (4. * x - 1.);
00946    d1y = a * (4. * y - 3.);
00947    d2y = a * (4. - 8. * y);
00948    d3y = a * (4. * y - 1.);
00949 
00950    dshape(0,0) = d1x * l1y;
00951    dshape(0,1) = l1x * d1y;
00952 
00953    dshape(4,0) = d2x * l1y;
00954    dshape(4,1) = l2x * d1y;
00955 
00956    dshape(1,0) = d3x * l1y;
00957    dshape(1,1) = l3x * d1y;
00958 
00959    dshape(7,0) = d1x * l2y;
00960    dshape(7,1) = l1x * d2y;
00961 
00962    dshape(8,0) = d2x * l2y;
00963    dshape(8,1) = l2x * d2y;
00964 
00965    dshape(5,0) = d3x * l2y;
00966    dshape(5,1) = l3x * d2y;
00967 
00968    dshape(3,0) = d1x * l3y;
00969    dshape(3,1) = l1x * d3y;
00970 
00971    dshape(6,0) = d2x * l3y;
00972    dshape(6,1) = l2x * d3y;
00973 
00974    dshape(2,0) = d3x * l3y;
00975    dshape(2,1) = l3x * d3y;
00976 }
00977 
00978 BiCubic2DFiniteElement::BiCubic2DFiniteElement()
00979    : NodalFiniteElement (2, Geometry::SQUARE, 16, 3, FunctionSpace::Qk)
00980 {
00981    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = 0.;
00982    Nodes.IntPoint(0).y = 0.;
00983    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = 1.;
00984    Nodes.IntPoint(1).y = 0.;
00985    Nodes.IntPoint(2).x = 1.;
00986    Nodes.IntPoint(2).y = 1.;
00987    Nodes.IntPoint(3).x = 0.;
00988    Nodes.IntPoint(3).y = 1.;
00989    Nodes.IntPoint(4).x = 1./3.;
00990    Nodes.IntPoint(4).y = 0.;
00991    Nodes.IntPoint(5).x = 2./3.;
00992    Nodes.IntPoint(5).y = 0.;
00993    Nodes.IntPoint(6).x = 1.;
00994    Nodes.IntPoint(6).y = 1./3.;
00995    Nodes.IntPoint(7).x = 1.;
00996    Nodes.IntPoint(7).y = 2./3.;
00997    Nodes.IntPoint(8).x = 2./3.;
00998    Nodes.IntPoint(8).y = 1.;
00999    Nodes.IntPoint(9).x = 1./3.;
01000    Nodes.IntPoint(9).y = 1.;
01001    Nodes.IntPoint(10).x = 0.;
01002    Nodes.IntPoint(10).y = 2./3.;
01003    Nodes.IntPoint(11).x = 0.;
01004    Nodes.IntPoint(11).y = 1./3.;
01005    Nodes.IntPoint(12).x = 1./3.;
01006    Nodes.IntPoint(12).y = 1./3.;
01007    Nodes.IntPoint(13).x = 2./3.;
01008    Nodes.IntPoint(13).y = 1./3.;
01009    Nodes.IntPoint(14).x = 1./3.;
01010    Nodes.IntPoint(14).y = 2./3.;
01011    Nodes.IntPoint(15).x = 2./3.;
01012    Nodes.IntPoint(15).y = 2./3.;
01013 }
01014 
01015 void BiCubic2DFiniteElement::CalcShape(
01016    const IntegrationPoint &ip, Vector &shape) const
01017 {
01018    double x = ip.x, y = ip.y;
01019 
01020    double w1x, w2x, w3x, w1y, w2y, w3y;
01021    double l0x, l1x, l2x, l3x, l0y, l1y, l2y, l3y;
01022 
01023    w1x = x - 1./3.; w2x = x - 2./3.; w3x = x - 1.;
01024    w1y = y - 1./3.; w2y = y - 2./3.; w3y = y - 1.;
01025 
01026    l0x = (- 4.5) * w1x * w2x * w3x;
01027    l1x = ( 13.5) *   x * w2x * w3x;
01028    l2x = (-13.5) *   x * w1x * w3x;
01029    l3x = (  4.5) *   x * w1x * w2x;
01030 
01031    l0y = (- 4.5) * w1y * w2y * w3y;
01032    l1y = ( 13.5) *   y * w2y * w3y;
01033    l2y = (-13.5) *   y * w1y * w3y;
01034    l3y = (  4.5) *   y * w1y * w2y;
01035 
01036    shape(0)  = l0x * l0y;
01037    shape(1)  = l3x * l0y;
01038    shape(2)  = l3x * l3y;
01039    shape(3)  = l0x * l3y;
01040    shape(4)  = l1x * l0y;
01041    shape(5)  = l2x * l0y;
01042    shape(6)  = l3x * l1y;
01043    shape(7)  = l3x * l2y;
01044    shape(8)  = l2x * l3y;
01045    shape(9)  = l1x * l3y;
01046    shape(10) = l0x * l2y;
01047    shape(11) = l0x * l1y;
01048    shape(12) = l1x * l1y;
01049    shape(13) = l2x * l1y;
01050    shape(14) = l1x * l2y;
01051    shape(15) = l2x * l2y;
01052 }
01053 
01054 void BiCubic2DFiniteElement::CalcDShape(
01055    const IntegrationPoint &ip, DenseMatrix &dshape) const
01056 {
01057    double x = ip.x, y = ip.y;
01058 
01059    double w1x, w2x, w3x, w1y, w2y, w3y;
01060    double l0x, l1x, l2x, l3x, l0y, l1y, l2y, l3y;
01061    double d0x, d1x, d2x, d3x, d0y, d1y, d2y, d3y;
01062 
01063    w1x = x - 1./3.; w2x = x - 2./3.; w3x = x - 1.;
01064    w1y = y - 1./3.; w2y = y - 2./3.; w3y = y - 1.;
01065 
01066    l0x = (- 4.5) * w1x * w2x * w3x;
01067    l1x = ( 13.5) *   x * w2x * w3x;
01068    l2x = (-13.5) *   x * w1x * w3x;
01069    l3x = (  4.5) *   x * w1x * w2x;
01070 
01071    l0y = (- 4.5) * w1y * w2y * w3y;
01072    l1y = ( 13.5) *   y * w2y * w3y;
01073    l2y = (-13.5) *   y * w1y * w3y;
01074    l3y = (  4.5) *   y * w1y * w2y;
01075 
01076    d0x = -5.5 + ( 18. - 13.5 * x) * x;
01077    d1x =  9.  + (-45. + 40.5 * x) * x;
01078    d2x = -4.5 + ( 36. - 40.5 * x) * x;
01079    d3x =  1.  + (- 9. + 13.5 * x) * x;
01080 
01081    d0y = -5.5 + ( 18. - 13.5 * y) * y;
01082    d1y =  9.  + (-45. + 40.5 * y) * y;
01083    d2y = -4.5 + ( 36. - 40.5 * y) * y;
01084    d3y =  1.  + (- 9. + 13.5 * y) * y;
01085 
01086    dshape( 0,0) = d0x * l0y;   dshape( 0,1) = l0x * d0y;
01087    dshape( 1,0) = d3x * l0y;   dshape( 1,1) = l3x * d0y;
01088    dshape( 2,0) = d3x * l3y;   dshape( 2,1) = l3x * d3y;
01089    dshape( 3,0) = d0x * l3y;   dshape( 3,1) = l0x * d3y;
01090    dshape( 4,0) = d1x * l0y;   dshape( 4,1) = l1x * d0y;
01091    dshape( 5,0) = d2x * l0y;   dshape( 5,1) = l2x * d0y;
01092    dshape( 6,0) = d3x * l1y;   dshape( 6,1) = l3x * d1y;
01093    dshape( 7,0) = d3x * l2y;   dshape( 7,1) = l3x * d2y;
01094    dshape( 8,0) = d2x * l3y;   dshape( 8,1) = l2x * d3y;
01095    dshape( 9,0) = d1x * l3y;   dshape( 9,1) = l1x * d3y;
01096    dshape(10,0) = d0x * l2y;   dshape(10,1) = l0x * d2y;
01097    dshape(11,0) = d0x * l1y;   dshape(11,1) = l0x * d1y;
01098    dshape(12,0) = d1x * l1y;   dshape(12,1) = l1x * d1y;
01099    dshape(13,0) = d2x * l1y;   dshape(13,1) = l2x * d1y;
01100    dshape(14,0) = d1x * l2y;   dshape(14,1) = l1x * d2y;
01101    dshape(15,0) = d2x * l2y;   dshape(15,1) = l2x * d2y;
01102 }
01103 
01104 void BiCubic2DFiniteElement::CalcHessian(
01105    const IntegrationPoint &ip, DenseMatrix &h) const
01106 {
01107    double x = ip.x, y = ip.y;
01108 
01109    double w1x, w2x, w3x, w1y, w2y, w3y;
01110    double l0x, l1x, l2x, l3x, l0y, l1y, l2y, l3y;
01111    double d0x, d1x, d2x, d3x, d0y, d1y, d2y, d3y;
01112    double h0x, h1x, h2x, h3x, h0y, h1y, h2y, h3y;
01113 
01114    w1x = x - 1./3.; w2x = x - 2./3.; w3x = x - 1.;
01115    w1y = y - 1./3.; w2y = y - 2./3.; w3y = y - 1.;
01116 
01117    l0x = (- 4.5) * w1x * w2x * w3x;
01118    l1x = ( 13.5) *   x * w2x * w3x;
01119    l2x = (-13.5) *   x * w1x * w3x;
01120    l3x = (  4.5) *   x * w1x * w2x;
01121 
01122    l0y = (- 4.5) * w1y * w2y * w3y;
01123    l1y = ( 13.5) *   y * w2y * w3y;
01124    l2y = (-13.5) *   y * w1y * w3y;
01125    l3y = (  4.5) *   y * w1y * w2y;
01126 
01127    d0x = -5.5 + ( 18. - 13.5 * x) * x;
01128    d1x =  9.  + (-45. + 40.5 * x) * x;
01129    d2x = -4.5 + ( 36. - 40.5 * x) * x;
01130    d3x =  1.  + (- 9. + 13.5 * x) * x;
01131 
01132    d0y = -5.5 + ( 18. - 13.5 * y) * y;
01133    d1y =  9.  + (-45. + 40.5 * y) * y;
01134    d2y = -4.5 + ( 36. - 40.5 * y) * y;
01135    d3y =  1.  + (- 9. + 13.5 * y) * y;
01136 
01137    h0x = -27. * x + 18.;
01138    h1x =  81. * x - 45.;
01139    h2x = -81. * x + 36.;
01140    h3x =  27. * x -  9.;
01141 
01142    h0y = -27. * y + 18.;
01143    h1y =  81. * y - 45.;
01144    h2y = -81. * y + 36.;
01145    h3y =  27. * y -  9.;
01146 
01147    h( 0,0) = h0x * l0y;   h( 0,1) = d0x * d0y;   h( 0,2) = l0x * h0y;
01148    h( 1,0) = h3x * l0y;   h( 1,1) = d3x * d0y;   h( 1,2) = l3x * h0y;
01149    h( 2,0) = h3x * l3y;   h( 2,1) = d3x * d3y;   h( 2,2) = l3x * h3y;
01150    h( 3,0) = h0x * l3y;   h( 3,1) = d0x * d3y;   h( 3,2) = l0x * h3y;
01151    h( 4,0) = h1x * l0y;   h( 4,1) = d1x * d0y;   h( 4,2) = l1x * h0y;
01152    h( 5,0) = h2x * l0y;   h( 5,1) = d2x * d0y;   h( 5,2) = l2x * h0y;
01153    h( 6,0) = h3x * l1y;   h( 6,1) = d3x * d1y;   h( 6,2) = l3x * h1y;
01154    h( 7,0) = h3x * l2y;   h( 7,1) = d3x * d2y;   h( 7,2) = l3x * h2y;
01155    h( 8,0) = h2x * l3y;   h( 8,1) = d2x * d3y;   h( 8,2) = l2x * h3y;
01156    h( 9,0) = h1x * l3y;   h( 9,1) = d1x * d3y;   h( 9,2) = l1x * h3y;
01157    h(10,0) = h0x * l2y;   h(10,1) = d0x * d2y;   h(10,2) = l0x * h2y;
01158    h(11,0) = h0x * l1y;   h(11,1) = d0x * d1y;   h(11,2) = l0x * h1y;
01159    h(12,0) = h1x * l1y;   h(12,1) = d1x * d1y;   h(12,2) = l1x * h1y;
01160    h(13,0) = h2x * l1y;   h(13,1) = d2x * d1y;   h(13,2) = l2x * h1y;
01161    h(14,0) = h1x * l2y;   h(14,1) = d1x * d2y;   h(14,2) = l1x * h2y;
01162    h(15,0) = h2x * l2y;   h(15,1) = d2x * d2y;   h(15,2) = l2x * h2y;
01163 }
01164 
01165 
01166 Cubic1DFiniteElement::Cubic1DFiniteElement()
01167    : NodalFiniteElement(1, Geometry::SEGMENT, 4, 3)
01168 {
01169    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = 0.0;
01170    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = 1.0;
01171    Nodes.IntPoint(2).x = 0.33333333333333333333;
01172    Nodes.IntPoint(3).x = 0.66666666666666666667;
01173 }
01174 
01175 void Cubic1DFiniteElement::CalcShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
01176                                      Vector &shape) const
01177 {
01178    double x = ip.x;
01179    double l1 = x,
01180       l2 = (1.0-x),
01181       l3 = (0.33333333333333333333-x),
01182       l4 = (0.66666666666666666667-x);
01183 
01184    shape(0) =   4.5 * l2 * l3 * l4;
01185    shape(1) =   4.5 * l1 * l3 * l4;
01186    shape(2) =  13.5 * l1 * l2 * l4;
01187    shape(3) = -13.5 * l1 * l2 * l3;
01188 }
01189 
01190 void Cubic1DFiniteElement::CalcDShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
01191                                       DenseMatrix &dshape) const
01192 {
01193    double x = ip.x;
01194 
01195    dshape(0,0) = -5.5 + x * (18. - 13.5 * x);
01196    dshape(1,0) = 1. - x * (9. - 13.5 * x);
01197    dshape(2,0) = 9. - x * (45. - 40.5 * x);
01198    dshape(3,0) = -4.5 + x * (36. - 40.5 * x);
01199 }
01200 
01201 
01202 Cubic2DFiniteElement::Cubic2DFiniteElement()
01203    : NodalFiniteElement(2, Geometry::TRIANGLE, 10, 3)
01204 {
01205    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = 0.0;
01206    Nodes.IntPoint(0).y = 0.0;
01207    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = 1.0;
01208    Nodes.IntPoint(1).y = 0.0;
01209    Nodes.IntPoint(2).x = 0.0;
01210    Nodes.IntPoint(2).y = 1.0;
01211    Nodes.IntPoint(3).x = 0.33333333333333333333;
01212    Nodes.IntPoint(3).y = 0.0;
01213    Nodes.IntPoint(4).x = 0.66666666666666666667;
01214    Nodes.IntPoint(4).y = 0.0;
01215    Nodes.IntPoint(5).x = 0.66666666666666666667;
01216    Nodes.IntPoint(5).y = 0.33333333333333333333;
01217    Nodes.IntPoint(6).x = 0.33333333333333333333;
01218    Nodes.IntPoint(6).y = 0.66666666666666666667;
01219    Nodes.IntPoint(7).x = 0.0;
01220    Nodes.IntPoint(7).y = 0.66666666666666666667;
01221    Nodes.IntPoint(8).x = 0.0;
01222    Nodes.IntPoint(8).y = 0.33333333333333333333;
01223    Nodes.IntPoint(9).x = 0.33333333333333333333;
01224    Nodes.IntPoint(9).y = 0.33333333333333333333;
01225 }
01226 
01227 void Cubic2DFiniteElement::CalcShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
01228                                      Vector &shape) const
01229 {
01230    double x = ip.x, y = ip.y;
01231    double l1 = (-1. + x + y),
01232       lx = (-1. + 3.*x),
01233       ly = (-1. + 3.*y);
01234 
01235    shape(0) = -0.5*l1*(3.*l1 + 1.)*(3.*l1 + 2.);
01236    shape(1) =  0.5*x*(lx - 1.)*lx;
01237    shape(2) =  0.5*y*(-1. + ly)*ly;
01238    shape(3) =  4.5*x*l1*(3.*l1 + 1.);
01239    shape(4) = -4.5*x*lx*l1;
01240    shape(5) =  4.5*x*lx*y;
01241    shape(6) =  4.5*x*y*ly;
01242    shape(7) = -4.5*y*l1*ly;
01243    shape(8) =  4.5*y*l1*(1. + 3.*l1);
01244    shape(9) = -27.*x*y*l1;
01245 }
01246 
01247 void Cubic2DFiniteElement::CalcDShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
01248                                       DenseMatrix &dshape) const
01249 {
01250    double x = ip.x, y = ip.y;
01251 
01252    dshape(0,0) =  0.5*(-11. + 36.*y - 9.*(x*(-4. + 3.*x) + 6.*x*y + 3.*y*y));
01253    dshape(1,0) =  1. + 4.5*x*(-2. + 3.*x);
01254    dshape(2,0) =  0.;
01255    dshape(3,0) =  4.5*(2. + 9.*x*x - 5.*y + 3.*y*y + 2.*x*(-5. + 6.*y));
01256    dshape(4,0) = -4.5*(1. - 1.*y + x*(-8. + 9.*x + 6.*y));
01257    dshape(5,0) =  4.5*(-1. + 6.*x)*y;
01258    dshape(6,0) =  4.5*y*(-1. + 3.*y);
01259    dshape(7,0) =  4.5*(1. - 3.*y)*y;
01260    dshape(8,0) =  4.5*y*(-5. + 6.*x + 6.*y);
01261    dshape(9,0) =  -27.*y*(-1. + 2.*x + y);
01262 
01263    dshape(0,1) =  0.5*(-11. + 36.*y - 9.*(x*(-4. + 3.*x) + 6.*x*y + 3.*y*y));
01264    dshape(1,1) =  0.;
01265    dshape(2,1) =  1. + 4.5*y*(-2. + 3.*y);
01266    dshape(3,1) =  4.5*x*(-5. + 6.*x + 6.*y);
01267    dshape(4,1) =  4.5*(1. - 3.*x)*x;
01268    dshape(5,1) =  4.5*x*(-1. + 3.*x);
01269    dshape(6,1) =  4.5*x*(-1. + 6.*y);
01270    dshape(7,1) = -4.5*(1. + x*(-1. + 6.*y) + y*(-8. + 9.*y));
01271    dshape(8,1) =  4.5*(2. + 3.*x*x + y*(-10. + 9.*y) + x*(-5. + 12.*y));
01272    dshape(9,1) = -27.*x*(-1. + x + 2.*y);
01273 }
01274 
01275 void Cubic2DFiniteElement::CalcHessian (const IntegrationPoint &ip,
01276                                         DenseMatrix &h) const
01277 {
01278    double x = ip.x, y = ip.y;
01279 
01280    h(0,0) = 18.-27.*(x+y);
01281    h(0,1) = 18.-27.*(x+y);
01282    h(0,2) = 18.-27.*(x+y);
01283 
01284    h(1,0) = -9.+27.*x;
01285    h(1,1) = 0.;
01286    h(1,2) = 0.;
01287 
01288    h(2,0) = 0.;
01289    h(2,1) = 0.;
01290    h(2,2) = -9.+27.*y;
01291 
01292    h(3,0) = -45.+81.*x+54.*y;
01293    h(3,1) = -22.5+54.*x+27.*y;
01294    h(3,2) = 27.*x;
01295 
01296    h(4,0) = 36.-81.*x-27.*y;
01297    h(4,1) = 4.5-27.*x;
01298    h(4,2) = 0.;
01299 
01300    h(5,0) = 27.*y;
01301    h(5,1) = -4.5+27.*x;
01302    h(5,2) = 0.;
01303 
01304    h(6,0) = 0.;
01305    h(6,1) = -4.5+27.*y;
01306    h(6,2) = 27.*x;
01307 
01308    h(7,0) = 0.;
01309    h(7,1) = 4.5-27.*y;
01310    h(7,2) = 36.-27.*x-81.*y;
01311 
01312    h(8,0) = 27.*y;
01313    h(8,1) = -22.5+27.*x+54.*y;
01314    h(8,2) = -45.+54.*x+81.*y;
01315 
01316    h(9,0) = -54.*y;
01317    h(9,1) = 27.-54.*(x+y);
01318    h(9,2) = -54.*x;
01319 }
01320 
01321 
01322 Cubic3DFiniteElement::Cubic3DFiniteElement()
01323    : NodalFiniteElement(3, Geometry::TETRAHEDRON, 20, 3)
01324 {
01325    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = 0;
01326    Nodes.IntPoint(0).y = 0;
01327    Nodes.IntPoint(0).z = 0;
01328    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = 1.;
01329    Nodes.IntPoint(1).y = 0;
01330    Nodes.IntPoint(1).z = 0;
01331    Nodes.IntPoint(2).x = 0;
01332    Nodes.IntPoint(2).y = 1.;
01333    Nodes.IntPoint(2).z = 0;
01334    Nodes.IntPoint(3).x = 0;
01335    Nodes.IntPoint(3).y = 0;
01336    Nodes.IntPoint(3).z = 1.;
01337    Nodes.IntPoint(4).x = 0.3333333333333333333333333333;
01338    Nodes.IntPoint(4).y = 0;
01339    Nodes.IntPoint(4).z = 0;
01340    Nodes.IntPoint(5).x = 0.6666666666666666666666666667;
01341    Nodes.IntPoint(5).y = 0;
01342    Nodes.IntPoint(5).z = 0;
01343    Nodes.IntPoint(6).x = 0;
01344    Nodes.IntPoint(6).y = 0.3333333333333333333333333333;
01345    Nodes.IntPoint(6).z = 0;
01346    Nodes.IntPoint(7).x = 0;
01347    Nodes.IntPoint(7).y = 0.6666666666666666666666666667;
01348    Nodes.IntPoint(7).z = 0;
01349    Nodes.IntPoint(8).x = 0;
01350    Nodes.IntPoint(8).y = 0;
01351    Nodes.IntPoint(8).z = 0.3333333333333333333333333333;
01352    Nodes.IntPoint(9).x = 0;
01353    Nodes.IntPoint(9).y = 0;
01354    Nodes.IntPoint(9).z = 0.6666666666666666666666666667;
01355    Nodes.IntPoint(10).x = 0.6666666666666666666666666667;
01356    Nodes.IntPoint(10).y = 0.3333333333333333333333333333;
01357    Nodes.IntPoint(10).z = 0;
01358    Nodes.IntPoint(11).x = 0.3333333333333333333333333333;
01359    Nodes.IntPoint(11).y = 0.6666666666666666666666666667;
01360    Nodes.IntPoint(11).z = 0;
01361    Nodes.IntPoint(12).x = 0.6666666666666666666666666667;
01362    Nodes.IntPoint(12).y = 0;
01363    Nodes.IntPoint(12).z = 0.3333333333333333333333333333;
01364    Nodes.IntPoint(13).x = 0.3333333333333333333333333333;
01365    Nodes.IntPoint(13).y = 0;
01366    Nodes.IntPoint(13).z = 0.6666666666666666666666666667;
01367    Nodes.IntPoint(14).x = 0;
01368    Nodes.IntPoint(14).y = 0.6666666666666666666666666667;
01369    Nodes.IntPoint(14).z = 0.3333333333333333333333333333;
01370    Nodes.IntPoint(15).x = 0;
01371    Nodes.IntPoint(15).y = 0.3333333333333333333333333333;
01372    Nodes.IntPoint(15).z = 0.6666666666666666666666666667;
01373    Nodes.IntPoint(16).x = 0.3333333333333333333333333333;
01374    Nodes.IntPoint(16).y = 0.3333333333333333333333333333;
01375    Nodes.IntPoint(16).z = 0.3333333333333333333333333333;
01376    Nodes.IntPoint(17).x = 0;
01377    Nodes.IntPoint(17).y = 0.3333333333333333333333333333;
01378    Nodes.IntPoint(17).z = 0.3333333333333333333333333333;
01379    Nodes.IntPoint(18).x = 0.3333333333333333333333333333;
01380    Nodes.IntPoint(18).y = 0;
01381    Nodes.IntPoint(18).z = 0.3333333333333333333333333333;
01382    Nodes.IntPoint(19).x = 0.3333333333333333333333333333;
01383    Nodes.IntPoint(19).y = 0.3333333333333333333333333333;
01384    Nodes.IntPoint(19).z = 0;
01385 }
01386 
01387 void Cubic3DFiniteElement::CalcShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
01388                                      Vector &shape) const
01389 {
01390    double x = ip.x, y = ip.y, z = ip.z;
01391 
01392    shape(0) = -((-1 + x + y + z)*(-2 + 3*x + 3*y + 3*z)*
01393                 (-1 + 3*x + 3*y + 3*z))/2.;
01394    shape(4) = (9*x*(-1 + x + y + z)*(-2 + 3*x + 3*y + 3*z))/2.;
01395    shape(5) = (-9*x*(-1 + 3*x)*(-1 + x + y + z))/2.;
01396    shape(1) = (x*(2 + 9*(-1 + x)*x))/2.;
01397    shape(6) = (9*y*(-1 + x + y + z)*(-2 + 3*x + 3*y + 3*z))/2.;
01398    shape(19) = -27*x*y*(-1 + x + y + z);
01399    shape(10) = (9*x*(-1 + 3*x)*y)/2.;
01400    shape(7) = (-9*y*(-1 + 3*y)*(-1 + x + y + z))/2.;
01401    shape(11) = (9*x*y*(-1 + 3*y))/2.;
01402    shape(2) = (y*(2 + 9*(-1 + y)*y))/2.;
01403    shape(8) = (9*z*(-1 + x + y + z)*(-2 + 3*x + 3*y + 3*z))/2.;
01404    shape(18) = -27*x*z*(-1 + x + y + z);
01405    shape(12) = (9*x*(-1 + 3*x)*z)/2.;
01406    shape(17) = -27*y*z*(-1 + x + y + z);
01407    shape(16) = 27*x*y*z;
01408    shape(14) = (9*y*(-1 + 3*y)*z)/2.;
01409    shape(9) = (-9*z*(-1 + x + y + z)*(-1 + 3*z))/2.;
01410    shape(13) = (9*x*z*(-1 + 3*z))/2.;
01411    shape(15) = (9*y*z*(-1 + 3*z))/2.;
01412    shape(3) = (z*(2 + 9*(-1 + z)*z))/2.;
01413 }
01414 
01415 void Cubic3DFiniteElement::CalcDShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
01416                                       DenseMatrix &dshape) const
01417 {
01418    double x = ip.x, y = ip.y, z = ip.z;
01419 
01420    dshape(0,0) = (-11 + 36*y + 36*z - 9*(3*pow(x,2) + 3*pow(y + z,2) +
01421                                          x*(-4 + 6*y + 6*z)))/2.;
01422    dshape(0,1) = (-11 + 36*y + 36*z - 9*(3*pow(x,2) + 3*pow(y + z,2) +
01423                                          x*(-4 + 6*y + 6*z)))/2.;
01424    dshape(0,2) = (-11 + 36*y + 36*z - 9*(3*pow(x,2) + 3*pow(y + z,2) +
01425                                          x*(-4 + 6*y + 6*z)))/2.;
01426    dshape(4,0) = (9*(9*pow(x,2) + (-1 + y + z)*(-2 + 3*y + 3*z) +
01427                      2*x*(-5 + 6*y + 6*z)))/2.;
01428    dshape(4,1) = (9*x*(-5 + 6*x + 6*y + 6*z))/2.;
01429    dshape(4,2) = (9*x*(-5 + 6*x + 6*y + 6*z))/2.;
01430    dshape(5,0) = (-9*(1 - y - z + x*(-8 + 9*x + 6*y + 6*z)))/2.;
01431    dshape(5,1) = (9*(1 - 3*x)*x)/2.;
01432    dshape(5,2) = (9*(1 - 3*x)*x)/2.;
01433    dshape(1,0) = 1 + (9*x*(-2 + 3*x))/2.;
01434    dshape(1,1) = 0;
01435    dshape(1,2) = 0;
01436    dshape(6,0) = (9*y*(-5 + 6*x + 6*y + 6*z))/2.;
01437    dshape(6,1) = (9*(2 + 3*pow(x,2) - 10*y - 5*z + 3*(y + z)*(3*y + z) +
01438                      x*(-5 + 12*y + 6*z)))/2.;
01439    dshape(6,2) = (9*y*(-5 + 6*x + 6*y + 6*z))/2.;
01440    dshape(19,0) = -27*y*(-1 + 2*x + y + z);
01441    dshape(19,1) = -27*x*(-1 + x + 2*y + z);
01442    dshape(19,2) = -27*x*y;
01443    dshape(10,0) = (9*(-1 + 6*x)*y)/2.;
01444    dshape(10,1) = (9*x*(-1 + 3*x))/2.;
01445    dshape(10,2) = 0;
01446    dshape(7,0) = (9*(1 - 3*y)*y)/2.;
01447    dshape(7,1) = (-9*(1 + x*(-1 + 6*y) - z + y*(-8 + 9*y + 6*z)))/2.;
01448    dshape(7,2) = (9*(1 - 3*y)*y)/2.;
01449    dshape(11,0) = (9*y*(-1 + 3*y))/2.;
01450    dshape(11,1) = (9*x*(-1 + 6*y))/2.;
01451    dshape(11,2) = 0;
01452    dshape(2,0) = 0;
01453    dshape(2,1) = 1 + (9*y*(-2 + 3*y))/2.;
01454    dshape(2,2) = 0;
01455    dshape(8,0) = (9*z*(-5 + 6*x + 6*y + 6*z))/2.;
01456    dshape(8,1) = (9*z*(-5 + 6*x + 6*y + 6*z))/2.;
01457    dshape(8,2) = (9*(2 + 3*pow(x,2) - 5*y - 10*z + 3*(y + z)*(y + 3*z) +
01458                      x*(-5 + 6*y + 12*z)))/2.;
01459    dshape(18,0) = -27*z*(-1 + 2*x + y + z);
01460    dshape(18,1) = -27*x*z;
01461    dshape(18,2) = -27*x*(-1 + x + y + 2*z);
01462    dshape(12,0) = (9*(-1 + 6*x)*z)/2.;
01463    dshape(12,1) = 0;
01464    dshape(12,2) = (9*x*(-1 + 3*x))/2.;
01465    dshape(17,0) = -27*y*z;
01466    dshape(17,1) = -27*z*(-1 + x + 2*y + z);
01467    dshape(17,2) = -27*y*(-1 + x + y + 2*z);
01468    dshape(16,0) = 27*y*z;
01469    dshape(16,1) = 27*x*z;
01470    dshape(16,2) = 27*x*y;
01471    dshape(14,0) = 0;
01472    dshape(14,1) = (9*(-1 + 6*y)*z)/2.;
01473    dshape(14,2) = (9*y*(-1 + 3*y))/2.;
01474    dshape(9,0) = (9*(1 - 3*z)*z)/2.;
01475    dshape(9,1) = (9*(1 - 3*z)*z)/2.;
01476    dshape(9,2) = (9*(-1 + x + y + 8*z - 6*(x + y)*z - 9*pow(z,2)))/2.;
01477    dshape(13,0) = (9*z*(-1 + 3*z))/2.;
01478    dshape(13,1) = 0;
01479    dshape(13,2) = (9*x*(-1 + 6*z))/2.;
01480    dshape(15,0) = 0;
01481    dshape(15,1) = (9*z*(-1 + 3*z))/2.;
01482    dshape(15,2) = (9*y*(-1 + 6*z))/2.;
01483    dshape(3,0) = 0;
01484    dshape(3,1) = 0;
01485    dshape(3,2) = 1 + (9*z*(-2 + 3*z))/2.;
01486 }
01487

01531 Linear3DFiniteElement::Linear3DFiniteElement()
01532    : NodalFiniteElement(3, Geometry::TETRAHEDRON, 4, 1)
01533 {
01534    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = 0.0;
01535    Nodes.IntPoint(0).y = 0.0;
01536    Nodes.IntPoint(0).z = 0.0;
01537    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = 1.0;
01538    Nodes.IntPoint(1).y = 0.0;
01539    Nodes.IntPoint(1).z = 0.0;
01540    Nodes.IntPoint(2).x = 0.0;
01541    Nodes.IntPoint(2).y = 1.0;
01542    Nodes.IntPoint(2).z = 0.0;
01543    Nodes.IntPoint(3).x = 0.0;
01544    Nodes.IntPoint(3).y = 0.0;
01545    Nodes.IntPoint(3).z = 1.0;
01546 }
01547 
01548 void Linear3DFiniteElement::CalcShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
01549                                       Vector &shape) const
01550 {
01551    shape(0) = 1. - ip.x - ip.y - ip.z;
01552    shape(1) = ip.x;
01553    shape(2) = ip.y;
01554    shape(3) = ip.z;
01555 }
01556 
01557 void Linear3DFiniteElement::CalcDShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
01558                                        DenseMatrix &dshape) const
01559 {
01560    if (dshape.Height() == 4)
01561    {
01562       double *A = &dshape(0,0);
01563       A[0] = -1.; A[4] = -1.; A[8]  = -1.;
01564       A[1] =  1.; A[5] =  0.; A[9]  =  0.;
01565       A[2] =  0.; A[6] =  1.; A[10] =  0.;
01566       A[3] =  0.; A[7] =  0.; A[11] =  1.;
01567    }
01568    else
01569    {
01570       dshape(0,0) = -1.; dshape(0,1) = -1.; dshape(0,2) = -1.;
01571       dshape(1,0) =  1.; dshape(1,1) =  0.; dshape(1,2) =  0.;
01572       dshape(2,0) =  0.; dshape(2,1) =  1.; dshape(2,2) =  0.;
01573       dshape(3,0) =  0.; dshape(3,1) =  0.; dshape(3,2) =  1.;
01574    }
01575 }
01576 
01577 void Linear3DFiniteElement::GetFaceDofs (int face, int **dofs, int *ndofs)
01578    const
01579 {
01580    static int face_dofs[4][3] = {{1, 2, 3}, {0, 2, 3}, {0, 1, 3}, {0, 1, 2}};
01581 
01582    *ndofs = 3;
01583    *dofs  = face_dofs[face];
01584 }

01587 Quadratic3DFiniteElement::Quadratic3DFiniteElement()
01588    : NodalFiniteElement(3, Geometry::TETRAHEDRON, 10, 2)
01589 {
01590    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = 0.0;
01591    Nodes.IntPoint(0).y = 0.0;
01592    Nodes.IntPoint(0).z = 0.0;
01593    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = 1.0;
01594    Nodes.IntPoint(1).y = 0.0;
01595    Nodes.IntPoint(1).z = 0.0;
01596    Nodes.IntPoint(2).x = 0.0;
01597    Nodes.IntPoint(2).y = 1.0;
01598    Nodes.IntPoint(2).z = 0.0;
01599    Nodes.IntPoint(3).x = 0.0;
01600    Nodes.IntPoint(3).y = 0.0;
01601    Nodes.IntPoint(3).z = 1.0;
01602    Nodes.IntPoint(4).x = 0.5;
01603    Nodes.IntPoint(4).y = 0.0;
01604    Nodes.IntPoint(4).z = 0.0;
01605    Nodes.IntPoint(5).x = 0.0;
01606    Nodes.IntPoint(5).y = 0.5;
01607    Nodes.IntPoint(5).z = 0.0;
01608    Nodes.IntPoint(6).x = 0.0;
01609    Nodes.IntPoint(6).y = 0.0;
01610    Nodes.IntPoint(6).z = 0.5;
01611    Nodes.IntPoint(7).x = 0.5;
01612    Nodes.IntPoint(7).y = 0.5;
01613    Nodes.IntPoint(7).z = 0.0;
01614    Nodes.IntPoint(8).x = 0.5;
01615    Nodes.IntPoint(8).y = 0.0;
01616    Nodes.IntPoint(8).z = 0.5;
01617    Nodes.IntPoint(9).x = 0.0;
01618    Nodes.IntPoint(9).y = 0.5;
01619    Nodes.IntPoint(9).z = 0.5;
01620 }
01621 
01622 void Quadratic3DFiniteElement::CalcShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
01623                                          Vector &shape) const
01624 {
01625    double L0, L1, L2, L3;
01626 
01627    L0 = 1. - ip.x - ip.y - ip.z;
01628    L1 = ip.x;
01629    L2 = ip.y;
01630    L3 = ip.z;
01631 
01632    shape(0) = L0 * ( 2.0 * L0 - 1.0 );
01633    shape(1) = L1 * ( 2.0 * L1 - 1.0 );
01634    shape(2) = L2 * ( 2.0 * L2 - 1.0 );
01635    shape(3) = L3 * ( 2.0 * L3 - 1.0 );
01636    shape(4) = 4.0 * L0 * L1;
01637    shape(5) = 4.0 * L0 * L2;
01638    shape(6) = 4.0 * L0 * L3;
01639    shape(7) = 4.0 * L1 * L2;
01640    shape(8) = 4.0 * L1 * L3;
01641    shape(9) = 4.0 * L2 * L3;
01642 }
01643 
01644 void Quadratic3DFiniteElement::CalcDShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
01645                                           DenseMatrix &dshape) const
01646 {
01647    double x, y, z, L0;
01648 
01649    x = ip.x;
01650    y = ip.y;
01651    z = ip.z;
01652    L0 = 1.0 - x - y - z;
01653 
01654    dshape(0,0) = dshape(0,1) = dshape(0,2) = 1.0 - 4.0 * L0;
01655    dshape(1,0) = -1.0 + 4.0 * x; dshape(1,1) = 0.0; dshape(1,2) = 0.0;
01656    dshape(2,0) = 0.0; dshape(2,1) = -1.0 + 4.0 * y; dshape(2,2) = 0.0;
01657    dshape(3,0) = dshape(3,1) = 0.0; dshape(3,2) = -1.0 + 4.0 * z;
01658    dshape(4,0) = 4.0 * (L0 - x); dshape(4,1) = dshape(4,2) = -4.0 * x;
01659    dshape(5,0) = dshape(5,2) = -4.0 * y; dshape(5,1) = 4.0 * (L0 - y);
01660    dshape(6,0) = dshape(6,1) = -4.0 * z; dshape(6,2) = 4.0 * (L0 - z);
01661    dshape(7,0) = 4.0 * y; dshape(7,1) = 4.0 * x; dshape(7,2) = 0.0;
01662    dshape(8,0) = 4.0 * z; dshape(8,1) = 0.0; dshape(8,2) = 4.0 * x;
01663    dshape(9,0) = 0.0; dshape(9,1) = 4.0 * z; dshape(9,2) = 4.0 * y;
01664 }
01665 
01666 TriLinear3DFiniteElement::TriLinear3DFiniteElement()
01667    : NodalFiniteElement(3, Geometry::CUBE, 8, 1, FunctionSpace::Qk)
01668 {
01669    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = 0.0;
01670    Nodes.IntPoint(0).y = 0.0;
01671    Nodes.IntPoint(0).z = 0.0;
01672 
01673    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = 1.0;
01674    Nodes.IntPoint(1).y = 0.0;
01675    Nodes.IntPoint(1).z = 0.0;
01676 
01677    Nodes.IntPoint(2).x = 1.0;
01678    Nodes.IntPoint(2).y = 1.0;
01679    Nodes.IntPoint(2).z = 0.0;
01680 
01681    Nodes.IntPoint(3).x = 0.0;
01682    Nodes.IntPoint(3).y = 1.0;
01683    Nodes.IntPoint(3).z = 0.0;
01684 
01685    Nodes.IntPoint(4).x = 0.0;
01686    Nodes.IntPoint(4).y = 0.0;
01687    Nodes.IntPoint(4).z = 1.0;
01688 
01689    Nodes.IntPoint(5).x = 1.0;
01690    Nodes.IntPoint(5).y = 0.0;
01691    Nodes.IntPoint(5).z = 1.0;
01692 
01693    Nodes.IntPoint(6).x = 1.0;
01694    Nodes.IntPoint(6).y = 1.0;
01695    Nodes.IntPoint(6).z = 1.0;
01696 
01697    Nodes.IntPoint(7).x = 0.0;
01698    Nodes.IntPoint(7).y = 1.0;
01699    Nodes.IntPoint(7).z = 1.0;
01700 }
01701 
01702 void TriLinear3DFiniteElement::CalcShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
01703                                          Vector &shape) const
01704 {
01705    double x = ip.x, y = ip.y, z = ip.z;
01706    double ox = 1.-x, oy = 1.-y, oz = 1.-z;
01707 
01708    shape(0) = ox * oy * oz;
01709    shape(1) =  x * oy * oz;
01710    shape(2) =  x *  y * oz;
01711    shape(3) = ox *  y * oz;
01712    shape(4) = ox * oy *  z;
01713    shape(5) =  x * oy *  z;
01714    shape(6) =  x *  y *  z;
01715    shape(7) = ox *  y *  z;
01716 }
01717 
01718 void TriLinear3DFiniteElement::CalcDShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
01719                                           DenseMatrix &dshape) const
01720 {
01721    double x = ip.x, y = ip.y, z = ip.z;
01722    double ox = 1.-x, oy = 1.-y, oz = 1.-z;
01723 
01724    dshape(0,0) = - oy * oz;
01725    dshape(0,1) = - ox * oz;
01726    dshape(0,2) = - ox * oy;
01727 
01728    dshape(1,0) =   oy * oz;
01729    dshape(1,1) = -  x * oz;
01730    dshape(1,2) = -  x * oy;
01731 
01732    dshape(2,0) =    y * oz;
01733    dshape(2,1) =    x * oz;
01734    dshape(2,2) = -  x *  y;
01735 
01736    dshape(3,0) = -  y * oz;
01737    dshape(3,1) =   ox * oz;
01738    dshape(3,2) = - ox *  y;
01739 
01740    dshape(4,0) = - oy *  z;
01741    dshape(4,1) = - ox *  z;
01742    dshape(4,2) =   ox * oy;
01743 
01744    dshape(5,0) =   oy *  z;
01745    dshape(5,1) = -  x *  z;
01746    dshape(5,2) =    x * oy;
01747 
01748    dshape(6,0) =    y *  z;
01749    dshape(6,1) =    x *  z;
01750    dshape(6,2) =    x *  y;
01751 
01752    dshape(7,0) = -  y *  z;
01753    dshape(7,1) =   ox *  z;
01754    dshape(7,2) =   ox *  y;
01755 }
01756

01772    dshape(0,0) = 0.0;
01773 }

01775 CrouzeixRaviartFiniteElement::CrouzeixRaviartFiniteElement()
01776    : NodalFiniteElement(2, Geometry::TRIANGLE , 3, 1)
01777 {
01778    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = 0.5;
01779    Nodes.IntPoint(0).y = 0.0;
01780    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = 0.5;
01781    Nodes.IntPoint(1).y = 0.5;
01782    Nodes.IntPoint(2).x = 0.0;
01783    Nodes.IntPoint(2).y = 0.5;
01784 }
01785 
01786 void CrouzeixRaviartFiniteElement::CalcShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
01787                                              Vector &shape) const
01788 {
01789    shape(0) =  1.0 - 2.0 * ip.y;
01790    shape(1) = -1.0 + 2.0 * ( ip.x + ip.y );
01791    shape(2) =  1.0 - 2.0 * ip.x;
01792 }
01793 
01794 void CrouzeixRaviartFiniteElement::CalcDShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
01795                                               DenseMatrix &dshape) const
01796 {
01797    dshape(0,0) =  0.0; dshape(0,1) = -2.0;
01798    dshape(1,0) =  2.0; dshape(1,1) =  2.0;
01799    dshape(2,0) = -2.0; dshape(2,1) =  0.0;
01800 }
01801 
01802 CrouzeixRaviartQuadFiniteElement::CrouzeixRaviartQuadFiniteElement()
01803 // the FunctionSpace should be rotated (45 degrees) Q_1
01804 // i.e. the span of { 1, x, y, x^2 - y^2 }
01805    : NodalFiniteElement(2, Geometry::SQUARE , 4, 2, FunctionSpace::Qk)
01806 
01807 {
01808    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = 0.5;
01809    Nodes.IntPoint(0).y = 0.0;
01810    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = 1.0;
01811    Nodes.IntPoint(1).y = 0.5;
01812    Nodes.IntPoint(2).x = 0.5;
01813    Nodes.IntPoint(2).y = 1.0;
01814    Nodes.IntPoint(3).x = 0.0;
01815    Nodes.IntPoint(3).y = 0.5;
01816 }
01817 
01818 void CrouzeixRaviartQuadFiniteElement::CalcShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
01819                                                  Vector &shape) const
01820 {
01821    const double l1 = ip.x+ip.y-0.5, l2 = 1.-l1, l3 = ip.x-ip.y+0.5, l4 = 1.-l3;
01822 
01823    shape(0) = l2 * l3;
01824    shape(1) = l1 * l3;
01825    shape(2) = l1 * l4;
01826    shape(3) = l2 * l4;
01827 }
01828 
01829 void CrouzeixRaviartQuadFiniteElement::CalcDShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
01830                                                   DenseMatrix &dshape) const
01831 {
01832    const double x2 = 2.*ip.x, y2 = 2.*ip.y;
01833 
01834    dshape(0,0) =  1. - x2; dshape(0,1) = -2. + y2;
01835    dshape(1,0) =       x2; dshape(1,1) =  1. - y2;
01836    dshape(2,0) =  1. - x2; dshape(2,1) =       y2;
01837    dshape(3,0) = -2. + x2; dshape(3,1) =  1. - y2;
01838 }
01839 
01840 
01841 RT0TriangleFiniteElement::RT0TriangleFiniteElement()
01842    : VectorFiniteElement (2, Geometry::TRIANGLE, 3, 1)
01843 {
01844    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = 0.5;
01845    Nodes.IntPoint(0).y = 0.0;
01846    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = 0.5;
01847    Nodes.IntPoint(1).y = 0.5;
01848    Nodes.IntPoint(2).x = 0.0;
01849    Nodes.IntPoint(2).y = 0.5;
01850 }
01851 
01852 void RT0TriangleFiniteElement::CalcVShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
01853                                           DenseMatrix &shape) const
01854 {
01855    double x = ip.x, y = ip.y;
01856 
01857    shape(0,0) = x;
01858    shape(0,1) = y - 1.;
01859    shape(1,0) = x;
01860    shape(1,1) = y;
01861    shape(2,0) = x - 1.;
01862    shape(2,1) = y;
01863 }
01864 
01865 void RT0TriangleFiniteElement::CalcDivShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
01866                                             Vector &divshape) const
01867 {
01868    divshape(0) = 2.;
01869    divshape(1) = 2.;
01870    divshape(2) = 2.;
01871 }
01872 
01873 const double RT0TriangleFiniteElement::nk[3][2] =
01874 { {0, -1}, {1, 1}, {-1, 0} };
01875 
01876 void RT0TriangleFiniteElement::GetLocalInterpolation (
01877    ElementTransformation &Trans, DenseMatrix &I) const
01878 {
01879    int k, j;
01880 
01881 #ifdef MFEM_DEBUG
01882    for (k = 0; k < 3; k++)
01883    {
01884       CalcVShape (Nodes.IntPoint(k), vshape);
01885       for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
01886       {
01887          double d = vshape(j,0)*nk[k][0]+vshape(j,1)*nk[k][1];
01888          if (j == k) d -= 1.0;
01889          if (fabs(d) > 1.0e-12)
01890          {
01891             cerr << "RT0TriangleFiniteElement::GetLocalInterpolation (...)\n"
01892                " k = " << k << ", j = " << j << ", d = " << d << endl;
01893             mfem_error();
01894          }
01895       }
01896    }
01897 #endif
01898 
01899    IntegrationPoint ip;
01900    ip.x = ip.y = 0.0;
01901    Trans.SetIntPoint (&ip);
01902    // Trans must be linear
01903    // set Jinv = |J| J^{-t} = adj(J)^t
01904    CalcAdjugateTranspose (Trans.Jacobian(), Jinv);
01905    double vk[2];
01906    Vector xk (vk, 2);
01907 
01908    for (k = 0; k < 3; k++)
01909    {
01910       Trans.Transform (Nodes.IntPoint (k), xk);
01911       ip.x = vk[0]; ip.y = vk[1];
01912       CalcVShape (ip, vshape);
01913       //  vk = |J| J^{-t} nk
01914       vk[0] = Jinv(0,0)*nk[k][0]+Jinv(0,1)*nk[k][1];
01915       vk[1] = Jinv(1,0)*nk[k][0]+Jinv(1,1)*nk[k][1];
01916       for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
01917          if (fabs (I(k,j) = vshape(j,0)*vk[0]+vshape(j,1)*vk[1]) < 1.0e-12)
01918             I(k,j) = 0.0;
01919    }
01920 }
01921 
01922 void RT0TriangleFiniteElement::Project (
01923    VectorCoefficient &vc, ElementTransformation &Trans,
01924    Vector &dofs) const
01925 {
01926    double vk[2];
01927    Vector xk (vk, 2);
01928 
01929    for (int k = 0; k < 3; k++)
01930    {
01931       Trans.SetIntPoint (&Nodes.IntPoint (k));
01932       // set Jinv = |J| J^{-t} = adj(J)^t
01933       CalcAdjugateTranspose (Trans.Jacobian(), Jinv);
01934 
01935       vc.Eval (xk, Trans, Nodes.IntPoint (k));
01936       //  xk^t |J| J^{-t} nk
01937       dofs(k) = (vk[0] * ( Jinv(0,0)*nk[k][0]+Jinv(0,1)*nk[k][1] ) +
01938                  vk[1] * ( Jinv(1,0)*nk[k][0]+Jinv(1,1)*nk[k][1] ));
01939    }
01940 }
01941 
01942 RT0QuadFiniteElement::RT0QuadFiniteElement()
01943    : VectorFiniteElement (2, Geometry::SQUARE, 4, 1, FunctionSpace::Qk)
01944 {
01945    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = 0.5;
01946    Nodes.IntPoint(0).y = 0.0;
01947    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = 1.0;
01948    Nodes.IntPoint(1).y = 0.5;
01949    Nodes.IntPoint(2).x = 0.5;
01950    Nodes.IntPoint(2).y = 1.0;
01951    Nodes.IntPoint(3).x = 0.0;
01952    Nodes.IntPoint(3).y = 0.5;
01953 }
01954 
01955 void RT0QuadFiniteElement::CalcVShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
01956                                       DenseMatrix &shape) const
01957 {
01958    double x = ip.x, y = ip.y;
01959 
01960    shape(0,0) = 0;
01961    shape(0,1) = y - 1.;
01962    shape(1,0) = x;
01963    shape(1,1) = 0;
01964    shape(2,0) = 0;
01965    shape(2,1) = y;
01966    shape(3,0) = x - 1.;
01967    shape(3,1) = 0;
01968 }
01969 
01970 void RT0QuadFiniteElement::CalcDivShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
01971                                         Vector &divshape) const
01972 {
01973    divshape(0) = 1.;
01974    divshape(1) = 1.;
01975    divshape(2) = 1.;
01976    divshape(3) = 1.;
01977 }
01978 
01979 const double RT0QuadFiniteElement::nk[4][2] =
01980 { {0, -1}, {1, 0}, {0, 1}, {-1, 0} };
01981 
01982 void RT0QuadFiniteElement::GetLocalInterpolation (
01983    ElementTransformation &Trans, DenseMatrix &I) const
01984 {
01985    int k, j;
01986 
01987 #ifdef MFEM_DEBUG
01988    for (k = 0; k < 4; k++)
01989    {
01990       CalcVShape (Nodes.IntPoint(k), vshape);
01991       for (j = 0; j < 4; j++)
01992       {
01993          double d = vshape(j,0)*nk[k][0]+vshape(j,1)*nk[k][1];
01994          if (j == k) d -= 1.0;
01995          if (fabs(d) > 1.0e-12)
01996          {
01997             cerr << "RT0QuadFiniteElement::GetLocalInterpolation (...)\n"
01998                " k = " << k << ", j = " << j << ", d = " << d << endl;
01999             mfem_error();
02000          }
02001       }
02002    }
02003 #endif
02004 
02005    IntegrationPoint ip;
02006    ip.x = ip.y = 0.0;
02007    Trans.SetIntPoint (&ip);
02008    // Trans must be linear (more to have embedding?)
02009    // set Jinv = |J| J^{-t} = adj(J)^t
02010    CalcAdjugateTranspose (Trans.Jacobian(), Jinv);
02011    double vk[2];
02012    Vector xk (vk, 2);
02013 
02014    for (k = 0; k < 4; k++)
02015    {
02016       Trans.Transform (Nodes.IntPoint (k), xk);
02017       ip.x = vk[0]; ip.y = vk[1];
02018       CalcVShape (ip, vshape);
02019       //  vk = |J| J^{-t} nk
02020       vk[0] = Jinv(0,0)*nk[k][0]+Jinv(0,1)*nk[k][1];
02021       vk[1] = Jinv(1,0)*nk[k][0]+Jinv(1,1)*nk[k][1];
02022       for (j = 0; j < 4; j++)
02023          if (fabs (I(k,j) = vshape(j,0)*vk[0]+vshape(j,1)*vk[1]) < 1.0e-12)
02024             I(k,j) = 0.0;
02025    }
02026 }
02027 
02028 void RT0QuadFiniteElement::Project (
02029    VectorCoefficient &vc, ElementTransformation &Trans,
02030    Vector &dofs) const
02031 {
02032    double vk[2];
02033    Vector xk (vk, 2);
02034 
02035    for (int k = 0; k < 4; k++)
02036    {
02037       Trans.SetIntPoint (&Nodes.IntPoint (k));
02038       // set Jinv = |J| J^{-t} = adj(J)^t
02039       CalcAdjugateTranspose (Trans.Jacobian(), Jinv);
02040 
02041       vc.Eval (xk, Trans, Nodes.IntPoint (k));
02042       //  xk^t |J| J^{-t} nk
02043       dofs(k) = (vk[0] * ( Jinv(0,0)*nk[k][0]+Jinv(0,1)*nk[k][1] ) +
02044                  vk[1] * ( Jinv(1,0)*nk[k][0]+Jinv(1,1)*nk[k][1] ));
02045    }
02046 }
02047 
02048 RT1TriangleFiniteElement::RT1TriangleFiniteElement()
02049    : VectorFiniteElement (2, Geometry::TRIANGLE, 8, 2)
02050 {
02051    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = 0.33333333333333333333;
02052    Nodes.IntPoint(0).y = 0.0;
02053    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = 0.66666666666666666667;
02054    Nodes.IntPoint(1).y = 0.0;
02055    Nodes.IntPoint(2).x = 0.66666666666666666667;
02056    Nodes.IntPoint(2).y = 0.33333333333333333333;
02057    Nodes.IntPoint(3).x = 0.33333333333333333333;
02058    Nodes.IntPoint(3).y = 0.66666666666666666667;
02059    Nodes.IntPoint(4).x = 0.0;
02060    Nodes.IntPoint(4).y = 0.66666666666666666667;
02061    Nodes.IntPoint(5).x = 0.0;
02062    Nodes.IntPoint(5).y = 0.33333333333333333333;
02063    Nodes.IntPoint(6).x = 0.33333333333333333333;
02064    Nodes.IntPoint(6).y = 0.33333333333333333333;
02065    Nodes.IntPoint(7).x = 0.33333333333333333333;
02066    Nodes.IntPoint(7).y = 0.33333333333333333333;
02067 }
02068 
02069 void RT1TriangleFiniteElement::CalcVShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
02070                                           DenseMatrix &shape) const
02071 {
02072    double x = ip.x, y = ip.y;
02073 
02074    shape(0,0) = -2 * x * (-1 + x + 2 * y);
02075    shape(0,1) = -2 * (-1 + y) * (-1 + x + 2 * y);
02076    shape(1,0) =  2 * x * (x - y);
02077    shape(1,1) =  2 * (x - y) * (-1 + y);
02078    shape(2,0) =  2 * x * (-1 + 2 * x + y);
02079    shape(2,1) =  2 * y * (-1 + 2 * x + y);
02080    shape(3,0) =  2 * x * (-1 + x + 2 * y);
02081    shape(3,1) =  2 * y * (-1 + x + 2 * y);
02082    shape(4,0) = -2 * (-1 + x) * (x - y);
02083    shape(4,1) =  2 * y * (-x + y);
02084    shape(5,0) = -2 * (-1 + x) * (-1 + 2 * x + y);
02085    shape(5,1) = -2 * y * (-1 + 2 * x + y);
02086    shape(6,0) = -3 * x * (-2 + 2 * x + y);
02087    shape(6,1) = -3 * y * (-1 + 2 * x + y);
02088    shape(7,0) = -3 * x * (-1 + x + 2 * y);
02089    shape(7,1) = -3 * y * (-2 + x + 2 * y);
02090 }
02091 
02092 void RT1TriangleFiniteElement::CalcDivShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
02093                                             Vector &divshape) const
02094 {
02095    double x = ip.x, y = ip.y;
02096 
02097    divshape(0) = -2 * (-4 + 3 * x + 6 * y);
02098    divshape(1) =  2 + 6 * x - 6 * y;
02099    divshape(2) = -4 + 12 * x + 6 * y;
02100    divshape(3) = -4 + 6 * x + 12 * y;
02101    divshape(4) =  2 - 6 * x + 6 * y;
02102    divshape(5) = -2 * (-4 + 6 * x + 3 * y);
02103    divshape(6) = -9 * (-1 + 2 * x + y);
02104    divshape(7) = -9 * (-1 + x + 2 * y);
02105 }

02146 RT2TriangleFiniteElement::RT2TriangleFiniteElement()
02147    : VectorFiniteElement (2, Geometry::TRIANGLE, 15, 3)
02148 {
02149    const double p = 0.11270166537925831148;
02150 
02151    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = p;
02152    Nodes.IntPoint(0).y = 0.0;
02153    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = 0.5;
02154    Nodes.IntPoint(1).y = 0.0;
02155    Nodes.IntPoint(2).x = 1.-p;
02156    Nodes.IntPoint(2).y = 0.0;
02157    Nodes.IntPoint(3).x = 1.-p;
02158    Nodes.IntPoint(3).y = p;
02159    Nodes.IntPoint(4).x = 0.5;
02160    Nodes.IntPoint(4).y = 0.5;
02161    Nodes.IntPoint(5).x = p;
02162    Nodes.IntPoint(5).y = 1.-p;
02163    Nodes.IntPoint(6).x = 0.0;
02164    Nodes.IntPoint(6).y = 1.-p;
02165    Nodes.IntPoint(7).x = 0.0;
02166    Nodes.IntPoint(7).y = 0.5;
02167    Nodes.IntPoint(8).x = 0.0;
02168    Nodes.IntPoint(8).y = p;
02169    Nodes.IntPoint(9).x  = 0.25;
02170    Nodes.IntPoint(9).y  = 0.25;
02171    Nodes.IntPoint(10).x = 0.25;
02172    Nodes.IntPoint(10).y = 0.25;
02173    Nodes.IntPoint(11).x = 0.5;
02174    Nodes.IntPoint(11).y = 0.25;
02175    Nodes.IntPoint(12).x = 0.5;
02176    Nodes.IntPoint(12).y = 0.25;
02177    Nodes.IntPoint(13).x = 0.25;
02178    Nodes.IntPoint(13).y = 0.5;
02179    Nodes.IntPoint(14).x = 0.25;
02180    Nodes.IntPoint(14).y = 0.5;
02181 }
02182 
02183 void RT2TriangleFiniteElement::CalcVShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
02184                                           DenseMatrix &shape) const
02185 {
02186    double x = ip.x, y = ip.y;
02187 
02188    double Bx[15] = {1., 0., x, 0., y, 0., x*x, 0., x*y, 0., y*y, 0., x*x*x,
02189                     x*x*y, x*y*y};
02190    double By[15] = {0., 1., 0., x, 0., y, 0., x*x, 0., x*y, 0., y*y,
02191                     x*x*y, x*y*y, y*y*y};
02192 
02193    for (int i = 0; i < 15; i++)
02194    {
02195       double cx = 0.0, cy = 0.0;
02196       for (int j = 0; j < 15; j++)
02197       {
02198          cx += M[i][j] * Bx[j];
02199          cy += M[i][j] * By[j];
02200       }
02201       shape(i,0) = cx;
02202       shape(i,1) = cy;
02203    }
02204 }
02205 
02206 void RT2TriangleFiniteElement::CalcDivShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
02207                                             Vector &divshape) const
02208 {
02209    double x = ip.x, y = ip.y;
02210 
02211    double DivB[15] = {0., 0., 1., 0., 0., 1., 2.*x, 0., y, x, 0., 2.*y,
02212                       4.*x*x, 4.*x*y, 4.*y*y};
02213 
02214    for (int i = 0; i < 15; i++)
02215    {
02216       double div = 0.0;
02217       for (int j = 0; j < 15; j++)
02218          div += M[i][j] * DivB[j];
02219       divshape(i) = div;
02220    }
02221 }
02222 
02223 P1SegmentFiniteElement::P1SegmentFiniteElement()
02224    : NodalFiniteElement(1, Geometry::SEGMENT, 2, 1)
02225 {
02226    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = 0.33333333333333333333;
02227    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = 0.66666666666666666667;
02228 }
02229 
02230 void P1SegmentFiniteElement::CalcShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
02231                                        Vector &shape) const
02232 {
02233    double x = ip.x;
02234 
02235    shape(0) = 2. - 3. * x;
02236    shape(1) = 3. * x - 1.;
02237 }
02238 
02239 void P1SegmentFiniteElement::CalcDShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
02240                                         DenseMatrix &dshape) const
02241 {
02242    dshape(0,0) = -3.;
02243    dshape(1,0) =  3.;
02244 }
02245 
02246 
02247 P2SegmentFiniteElement::P2SegmentFiniteElement()
02248    : NodalFiniteElement(1, Geometry::SEGMENT, 3, 2)
02249 {
02250    const double p = 0.11270166537925831148;
02251 
02252    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = p;
02253    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = 0.5;
02254    Nodes.IntPoint(2).x = 1.-p;
02255 }
02256 
02257 void P2SegmentFiniteElement::CalcShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
02258                                        Vector &shape) const
02259 {
02260    const double p = 0.11270166537925831148;
02261    const double w = 1./((1-2*p)*(1-2*p));
02262    double x = ip.x;
02263 
02264    shape(0) = (2*x-1)*(x-1+p)*w;
02265    shape(1) = 4*(x-1+p)*(p-x)*w;
02266    shape(2) = (2*x-1)*(x-p)*w;
02267 }
02268 
02269 void P2SegmentFiniteElement::CalcDShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
02270                                         DenseMatrix &dshape) const
02271 {
02272    const double p = 0.11270166537925831148;
02273    const double w = 1./((1-2*p)*(1-2*p));
02274    double x = ip.x;
02275 
02276    dshape(0,0) = (-3+4*x+2*p)*w;
02277    dshape(1,0) = (4-8*x)*w;
02278    dshape(2,0) = (-1+4*x-2*p)*w;
02279 }
02280 
02281 
02282 Lagrange1DFiniteElement::Lagrange1DFiniteElement(int degree)
02283    : NodalFiniteElement(1, Geometry::SEGMENT, degree+1, degree)
02284 {
02285    int i, m = degree;
02286 
02287    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = 0.0;
02288    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = 1.0;
02289    for (i = 1; i < m; i++)
02290       Nodes.IntPoint(i+1).x = double(i) / m;
02291 
02292    rwk = new double[degree+1];
02293    rxxk = new double[degree+1];
02294 
02295    rwk[0] = 1.0;
02296    for (i = 1; i <= m; i++)
02297       rwk[i] = rwk[i-1] * ( (double)(m) / (double)(i) );
02298    for (i = 0; i < m/2+1; i++)
02299       rwk[m-i] = ( rwk[i] *= rwk[m-i] );
02300    for (i = m-1; i >= 0; i -= 2)
02301       rwk[i] = -rwk[i];
02302 }
02303 
02304 void Lagrange1DFiniteElement::CalcShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
02305                                         Vector &shape) const
02306 {
02307    double w, wk, x = ip.x;
02308    int i, k, m = GetOrder();
02309 
02310    k = (int) floor ( m * x + 0.5 );
02311    wk = 1.0;
02312    for (i = 0; i <= m; i++)
02313       if (i != k)
02314          wk *= ( rxxk[i] = x - (double)(i) / m );
02315    w = wk * ( rxxk[k] = x - (double)(k) / m );
02316 
02317    if (k != 0)
02318       shape(0) = w * rwk[0] / rxxk[0];
02319    else
02320       shape(0) = wk * rwk[0];
02321    if (k != m)
02322       shape(1) = w * rwk[m] / rxxk[m];
02323    else
02324       shape(1) = wk * rwk[k];
02325    for (i = 1; i < m; i++)
02326       if (i != k)
02327          shape(i+1) = w * rwk[i] / rxxk[i];
02328       else
02329          shape(k+1) = wk * rwk[k];
02330 }
02331 
02332 void Lagrange1DFiniteElement::CalcDShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
02333                                          DenseMatrix &dshape) const
02334 {
02335    double s, srx, w, wk, x = ip.x;
02336    int i, k, m = GetOrder();
02337 
02338    k = (int) floor ( m * x + 0.5 );
02339    wk = 1.0;
02340    for (i = 0; i <= m; i++)
02341       if (i != k)
02342          wk *= ( rxxk[i] = x - (double)(i) / m );
02343    w = wk * ( rxxk[k] = x - (double)(k) / m );
02344 
02345    for (i = 0; i <= m; i++)
02346       rxxk[i] = 1.0 / rxxk[i];
02347    srx = 0.0;
02348    for (i = 0; i <= m; i++)
02349       if (i != k)
02350          srx += rxxk[i];
02351    s = w * srx + wk;
02352 
02353    if (k != 0)
02354       dshape(0,0) = (s - w * rxxk[0]) * rwk[0] * rxxk[0];
02355    else
02356       dshape(0,0) = wk * srx * rwk[0];
02357    if (k != m)
02358       dshape(1,0) = (s - w * rxxk[m]) * rwk[m] * rxxk[m];
02359    else
02360       dshape(1,0) = wk * srx * rwk[k];
02361    for (i = 1; i < m; i++)
02362       if (i != k)
02363          dshape(i+1,0) = (s - w * rxxk[i]) * rwk[i] * rxxk[i];
02364       else
02365          dshape(k+1,0) = wk * srx * rwk[k];
02366 }
02367 
02368 Lagrange1DFiniteElement::~Lagrange1DFiniteElement()
02369 {
02370    delete [] rwk;
02371    delete [] rxxk;
02372 }
02373 
02374 
02375 P1TetNonConfFiniteElement::P1TetNonConfFiniteElement()
02376    : NodalFiniteElement(3, Geometry::TETRAHEDRON, 4, 1)
02377 {
02378    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = 0.33333333333333333333;
02379    Nodes.IntPoint(0).y = 0.33333333333333333333;
02380    Nodes.IntPoint(0).z = 0.33333333333333333333;
02381 
02382    Nodes.IntPoint(1).x = 0.0;
02383    Nodes.IntPoint(1).y = 0.33333333333333333333;
02384    Nodes.IntPoint(1).z = 0.33333333333333333333;
02385 
02386    Nodes.IntPoint(2).x = 0.33333333333333333333;
02387    Nodes.IntPoint(2).y = 0.0;
02388    Nodes.IntPoint(2).z = 0.33333333333333333333;
02389 
02390    Nodes.IntPoint(3).x = 0.33333333333333333333;
02391    Nodes.IntPoint(3).y = 0.33333333333333333333;
02392    Nodes.IntPoint(3).z = 0.0;
02393 
02394 }
02395 
02396 void P1TetNonConfFiniteElement::CalcShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
02397                                           Vector &shape) const
02398 {
02399    double L0, L1, L2, L3;
02400 
02401    L1 = ip.x;  L2 = ip.y;  L3 = ip.z;  L0 = 1.0 - L1 - L2 - L3;
02402    shape(0) = 1.0 - 3.0 * L0;
02403    shape(1) = 1.0 - 3.0 * L1;
02404    shape(2) = 1.0 - 3.0 * L2;
02405    shape(3) = 1.0 - 3.0 * L3;
02406 }
02407 
02408 void P1TetNonConfFiniteElement::CalcDShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
02409                                            DenseMatrix &dshape) const
02410 {
02411    dshape(0,0) =  3.0; dshape(0,1) =  3.0; dshape(0,2) =  3.0;
02412    dshape(1,0) = -3.0; dshape(1,1) =  0.0; dshape(1,2) =  0.0;
02413    dshape(2,0) =  0.0; dshape(2,1) = -3.0; dshape(2,2) =  0.0;
02414    dshape(3,0) =  0.0; dshape(3,1) =  0.0; dshape(3,2) = -3.0;
02415 }
02416 
02417

02420 {
02421    Nodes.IntPoint(0).x = 0.25;
02422    Nodes.IntPoint(0).y = 0.25;
02423    Nodes.IntPoint(0).z = 0.25;
02424 }

02426 void P0TetFiniteElement::CalcShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
02427                                    Vector &shape) const
02428 {
02429    shape(0) = 1.0;
02430 }
02431 
02432 void P0TetFiniteElement::CalcDShape(const IntegrationPoint &ip,
02433                                     DenseMatrix &dshape) const
02434 {
02435    dshape(0,0) =  0.0; dshape(0,1) =  0.0; dshape(0,2) = 0.0;
02436 }
